description: In Space Bouncer, player controls a character equipped with a jetpack. Upon hitting a wall, the character bounces off and changes direction. The goal is to avoid obstacles and collect as many points as possible. As player accumulates higher scores, the game speeds up, increasing the difficulty. Navigate through the challenging environment and aim for the highest score while avoiding hazards.
Title: Space Bouncer

description: Robot vs Monsters pits you against relentless waves of foes as you control a powerful robot in a top-down world. Defend yourself at the center, earning points for each monster vanquished. Collect falling items for strategic advantages. The goal? Rack up as many points as possible in this endless battle for supremacy!
Title: Robot vs Monsters

description: METEO PLANET is a fast-paced one-button game. Your goal is to collect as many coins as you can without getting caught by a meteorite. Avoid meteorites while rotating around the planet's axis.The closer the coin is to the meteorite, the more points it brings, but be careful not to get hit by the meteorite itself.
Title: METEO PLANET

description: Have you ever dreamed of finding a good company for tabletop role-playing games? Of creating a party of brave and reckless girls who defeat their rivals with the power of love and lust? Of seducing a dragon instead of fighting? EmyLiveShow: Dragon & Mistresses Tale can make those dreams come true! Dive into the lore of the fantasy world and guide three adventurers through it. Fight monsters, romance charming strangers, find powerful artifacts. Save the world and don't forget to thank your game master at the end of the session! EmyLiveShow: Dragon & Mistresses Tale is a tabletop role-playing game themed visual novel using dice rolling mechanics. Follow two parallel storylines. The girls at the table discuss the events, bicker, and try to get spoilers from the game master as they role-play. Help them to complete their quest peacefully or violently! Test your luck. Dice rolls will determine the outcome of your actions, but the story will continue anyway. Sometimes it's more fun to fail than to succeed! Arm your adventurers. The right equipment can help when the dice aren't on your side. But look carefully, some of these artifacts are cursed... Enjoy a variety of hot scenes for all tastes. Don't forget the little pleasures, even when the world is in danger. Original EmyLiveShow voice actors narrate all illustrated scenes! Get to know Emy, Nia, Uma and Six better! The EmyLiveShow Vtube project has grown since the S&M Story – meet new hostesses, check out the development of the old-timers and discover how they have fun and spend their free time together!
Title: EmyLiveShow: Dangers & Mysteries Tale

description: Enjoy 6 games in one with the perfect reproduction of real pinball machines, with all kinds of graphic details and sounds. Discover all the secrets, in these thrilling games, a great challenge awaits you. Complete all the missions and become number 1 in the world or the best among your Friends, posting your high score on the online leaderboard. - Arcade design. - More than 8 missions to accomplish for game! Are you ready? - Multiball, Extraball, Skillshot, Jackpots... - Reproduction with all the details, lights and sounds. - 4 different cameras to choose from. - Online Leaderboard. If you prefer, you can also purchase them separately in the PSN Store.
Title: Sports & Wild Pinball

description: "Learn Hangul!!" is a game that helps to memorize the basic Korean syllabary, Hangul. You have 3 lives which deplete after each wrong answer. Try to get the highest possible score!
Title: Learn Hangul!!

description: Sink ships in a shooting gallery
Title: Cazzarion: Shooting Gallery

description: Embark on a thrilling quest in 'Find The Thing'! In this immersive game, players are challenged to locate specific objects amidst a chaotic landscape of spawning items. With each successful discovery, players earn points and time, while the stakes increase with more objects spawning. As the score climbs, so does the intensity, with a cluttered playing field making each find more challenging. The ultimate goal? Achieve the highest score possible in this endless adventure of observation and quick thinking!
Title: Find The Thing

description: Unleash the power of music with our exclusive bundle! Get Drums Rock and the latest DLCs in one epic package. Save big and experience the perfect fusion of rhythm and adventure. Already own Drums Rock? Dive straight into the DLCs and expand your song library. Don't miss out on this incredible offer. Upgrade your gameplay now! Content of the Bundle: - Drums Rock - 'Down with the Sickness' - Disturbed - 'Ten Thousand Fists' - Disturbed - 'Walk' - Pantera - '5 Minutes Alone' - Pantera - 'American Idiot' - Green Day - 'Holiday' - Green Day - 'The American Dream is Killing Me' - Green Day - 'I'm Gonna Be(500 Miles)' - The Proclaimers - 'Stricken' - Disturbed - 'Hearts On Fire' - HammerFall - 'King for a Day' - Battle Beast - 'Blood Of The Elves' - Blind Guardian - 'When Angels Kill' - Fifth Angel - 'Higher' - NorthTale - 'Twilight Force' - Twilight Force - 'Welcome to My Life' - Simple Plan - 'Crazy' - Simple Plan - 'Shut Up!' - Simple Plan - 'Time To Say Goodbye' - Simple Plan - 'You're Gonna Go Far, Kid' - The Offspring - 'In the meantime' - Spacehog - 'My Own Worst Enemy' - Lit - 'Shine' - Collective Soul - 'MEGALOVANIA' - Undertale song - 'Hopes And Dreams' - Undertale song - 'The Underground' - Exclusive Undertale scene - 'Undertale Hands' - Exclusive Undertale Hands - 'Undertale Drums' - Exclusive Undertale Drums - 'Undertale Drumstick' - Exclusive Undertale Drumsticks Music Downloads Not Rated by the ESRB Visit www.esrb.org for rating information Music Downloads Not Rated by PEGI
Title: Drums Rock - Complete Music Edition

description: Weedcraft Inc explores the business of producing, breeding and selling weed in America, delving deep into the financial, political and cultural aspects of the country's complex relationship with this troublesome and promising plant. Weedcraft Inc: Deluxe Edition OST Combo comes with almost two hours of chilled beats straight from Weedcraft Inc, grinded and rolled by some of the top Polish hip hop producers. Would-be marijuana moguls will need to prioritize resources carefully as they manage the production and distribution of their weed. Cultivate killer plants, cross-breed them to create unique strains of the devil’s lettuce, hire and manage a growing staff, and be prepared to take on the competition. As in real life, the business of bud presents plenty of opportunity along with a plethora of problems. Decide when and where to take on extra risk to maximize profit, but be careful, the cops and politicians are all working their own angles. An important, controversial topic presented in an insightful and detailed manner, Weedcraft Inc presents a challenge to those who would rule the reefer, offering a series of diverse scenarios and unique characters to work with (or around) as your budding empire grows. Whether you choose to hobnob with politicians, pay off the police, fight for medical marijuana rights or work the legal system, it’s all in the name of the sticky icky and your cutthroat corporate profits. Features: - Includes a customizable sandbox mode, three extensive scenarios and an easier Chill Mode. - Controversy presented with insight. - Manage your budding business’ economy and distribution. - Choices that matter, characters with their own motivations all presented in a story with humor and heart. - Equip your grow room for the best yields and control every element of your grow. Adjust nutrition, water and trim your plants, even breed entirely new strains! - Change the laws, change society and change the way the world around you perceives your product. - Play by the rules, break them or just bend them a little. Morality is on a sliding scale in Weedcraft Inc. - Hire and fire employees, disrupt the competition and the law by any means at your disposal. Or keep your enemies close and make friends, the choice is yours.
Title: Weedcraft Inc: Deluxe Edition OST Combo

description: Step into the shoes of a supermarket owner in Supermarket Manager 2024, a dynamic 3D supermarket simulator where your business acumen will be put to the test! As the proud proprietor, your goal is to grow your supermarket empire by making smart purchasing decisions and optimizing your sales strategies. Key Features: Business Growth: Purchase a variety of products from different providers and strategically price them to attract more customers and maximize profits. Financial Management: Handle transactions with ease as customers pay with cash or credit cards. Use your earnings to invest back into your supermarket. Upgrades and Expansion: Reinvent your supermarket with upgrades and expansions. Enhance your store's layout, stock more products, and improve customer satisfaction to become the leading supermarket in town. Strategic Gameplay: Balance supply and demand, manage stock levels, and respond to customer preferences to keep your business thriving. Immersive 3D Environment: Experience the bustling atmosphere of a supermarket with stunning 3D graphics and detailed animations. Can you transform your modest store into a thriving retail giant? Find out in Supermarket Manager 2024, where every decision counts towards building your supermarket success story!
Title: Supermarket Manager 2024

description: Immerse yourself in the captivating world of the African savannah with Lion Simulator Survival: RPG Animal Battle, a realistic simulation game that thrusts you into the role of the king of the jungle. Roam vast landscapes, hunt for prey, establish your pride, and navigate the challenges of survival in the wild. Key Features: - Exploration: Discover diverse ecosystems and expansive grasslands teeming with life. Encounter a variety of animals as you traverse the landscape. - Realistic Lion Behaviour: Live the life of a lion with authentic behaviours, including hunting. Adapt to environmental patterns that influence your hunting strategies and overall survival. - Hunting and Prey Dynamics: Refine your hunting skills by stalking and capturing a range of prey. The game incorporates realistic prey behaviour, necessitating different strategies for hunting various animals. Manage your energy and health to ensure successful hunts. - Pride Management: Form and lead your pride, making strategic decisions to ensure the welfare of your lion family. Defend your territory against rival predators and engage in territorial disputes to assert dominance in the savannah. - Challenges and Quests: Tackle a variety of challenges and quests that assess your hunting skills, agility, and strategic prowess. Complete these missions to earn rewards and unlock new areas of the map.
Title: Lion Simulator Survival: RPG Animal Battle

description: Get ready to immerse yourself in an intriguing collection of new games with Just Find It 3! Uncover hidden differences, make exciting matches, challenge your memory, and solve engaging puzzles for surprising twists that will keep you captivated throughout your journey. - Play 7 kinds of games! - Search for bonus collectibles and extra hidden object challenges! - Make matches, find details, memory, montage, and swap tiles, too! - Play through the game in any order you want! - 25 extra bonus levels!
Title: Just Find It 3 Collector's Edition

description: Collect coins in a circus but avoid the fire
Title: Cazzarion: Jumping Tiger

description: Dive into the adorable world of Dog In Dogs, a memory-matching game where players uncover pairs of dog images. Start with a few pairs and increase the challenge as you progress. Each matched pair earns the player points and extra time. Aim to achieve the highest score by uncovering as many pairs as possible before time runs out!
Title: Dogs And Paws

description: Step into the world of "Anime Girls Basketball League," a captivating 3D basketball simulator that combines the excitement of real-life basketball with the vibrant charm of anime style. Choose your favorite anime girl skin and hit the courts for an immersive and thrilling experience. In "Anime Girls Basketball League," every match is an opportunity to showcase your skills and earn rewards. Win matches to earn money, which you can use to unlock stunning new skins and exclusive stadiums. Whether you're aiming for the top of the leaderboard or simply enjoying the dynamic gameplay, this game offers endless fun and challenges. Features: Anime Style Gameplay: Enjoy basketball like never before with unique anime girl characters and stunning visuals. Customizable Skins: Choose from a variety of skins and personalize your character to stand out on the court. Exciting Matches: Participate in thrilling basketball matches and outplay your opponents to earn rewards. Unlockable Content: Use your hard-earned money to unlock new skins and stadiums, enhancing your gaming experience. Immersive Experience: Dive into a world where basketball and anime collide, offering a fresh and engaging experience for all players. Get ready to dribble, shoot, and score in "Anime Girls Basketball League" – where your basketball dreams come to life in anime style!
Title: Anime Girls Basketball League

description: Rise from the Digital Dust, Build a Futuristic Metropolis: Begin your journey in the neon-lit streets of a sprawling cyber city, where technology and ambition drive the pulse of progress. In Cyber City Tycoon, you are tasked with the monumental challenge of constructing a thriving cyberpunk metropolis from scratch. Architect of Tomorrow: As the city planner and ruler, your decisions shape the destiny of countless lives. Lay the foundation with resource management strategies that harness the wealth of digital and physical resources—extract rare minerals from high-tech mines, cultivate advanced biotech labs, and manage energy grids to sustain your growing populace. Master the Art of Cyber Engineering: Unlock advanced technological marvels as your city expands. Design intricate network systems to ensure seamless communication, and construct architectural wonders that stand as a testament to your city’s innovation. Each building not only enhances your city’s efficiency but also its futuristic grandeur. Forge Alliances, Defend Your City: No city grows in isolation. Forge strategic alliances with neighboring corporations and manage trade routes that bring exotic technologies to your city’s gates. Train elite security forces to defend against the ever-looming threat of cyber attacks and rogue factions, and fortify your city with barriers that can withstand any digital or physical assault. Conquer and Prosper: Embark on missions to expand your territory. Each conquest brings new challenges and opportunities. Establish satellite colonies, integrate outlying districts into your metropolis, and tap into their unique resources. Cyber Deities or Your Own Genius?: While the AI overseers watch over your progress, your choices determine your favor in their algorithms. Conduct digital ceremonies and build data temples to win their blessings—or face their wrath. Navigate a world where AI interventions can alter the course of your city’s fate. A Living City: Each citizen in your city has a role—from hackers and traders to executives and engineers. Their lives intertwine with your decisions, creating a dynamic tapestry of human and cyber stories driven by your rule. Cyber City Tycoon isn’t just about building a city; it’s about weaving the fabric of a high-tech empire that will stand the test of time. Are you ready to leave your mark on the future?
Title: Cyberpunk City Tycoon

description: Explore a serene and mysterious world, collect shards, solve intricate puzzles, and assemble keys to unlock the mysteries of a secret society. When the enigmatic ancient artifact known as the 'Plinth' mysteriously materialises in your home, it opens a portal to a tranquil, dream-like world, filled with impossible architecture and hidden secrets waiting to be discovered. Guided by the echoes of past explorers, you will collect shards, solve three-dimensional puzzles, and assemble keys to unlock the mysteries of a secret society committed to maintaining the balance of Order and Chaos. Can you solve the puzzles and reveal the truth about the society, the legacy of the Plinth, and ultimately, your own place in this mystical world? Key Features: • 5 Stunning Worlds: Escape into five peaceful and soothing labyrinths filled with mysteries. • Rich Environmental Storytelling: Engage with a deep and captivating story embedded in the world. • Challenging and Accessible: Tackle mind-bending geometric puzzles at your own pace with intuitive controls. • Ethereal Soundscapes: Immerse yourself in rich, captivating audio and music, deepening your connection with the world.
Title: Infinite Inside

description: Get behind the wheel in one of the most frenetic extreme driving games. Mountain circuits descending at full throttle in different settings. Various interactive elements such as hurricanes, lava balls, giant spinning tops, which will cross in the middle of the competition track and will put your reflexes and extreme driving to the limit. Increase your experience by winning various stages and you will have access to new vehicles. Get coins for each victory and with them you can buy Nitros (turbos), resistance and maneuverability, elements with which you can improve your vehicles. • Pure arcade-style gameplay in different locations. • Train in a simulator and pass the tests to access the best club of drivers in extreme competition. • Vehicles with different characteristics and with various mechanical improvements. • Replayability! Get the 3 stars of each circuit. • Each race feels different with procedurally generated levels. Jumps, chicanes, dizzying speeds, slopes, skids and very aggressive and challenging competitors are part of what ‘Xtreme Club Racing’ has to offer. Don’t miss it... good luck!!!
Title: Xtreme Club Racing

description: Disaster Band is a rhythm game that will get you hooked. Easy to pick up with an intuitive control scheme, you can play freely with all the instruments included on any given track. But there's more: Connect with your friends online and play together, perform together and party together. Or join total strangers for a jam session you will not forget. The better you get, the higher you will climb in the global rankings. Accept the challenge and rise to the top - or gain infamy as the ultimate Disaster Band. There's nothing wrong with playing wrong With the creative freedom to play any note at any time, you can practice and improvise in absolutely every song while you explore the music. Don't forget: Practice makes Perfect. And of course, perfection pays off with leads to higher scores. But where is the fun in that? With Disaster Band's dynamic sound engine even playing the wrong notes leads to neverending fun and entertainment. The music never stops There is no end to your (not so) musical journey, thanks to mod.io support. Create your own tracks and share them via PC with the community of other Disaster Bands on their way to greatness. Or import other players' songs to get into a new groove in the practice room as well as on the worldwide stage. It is your time to shine! Features * Online-Multiplayer for up to 4 players - Regardless if you host or join a game, play with friends or strangers, no matter on what system you or your buddies play: The low-latency connection makes sure, that 'more players' absolutely mean 'more fun'! * Intuitive controls - Accurate, direct and hassle-free: Disaster Band makes sure that absolutely everybody can enjoy their way to musical stardom * Mod.io support - Create your own tracks (via MIDI) and share them with the Disaster Band community.(*) * 15 instruments to choose from - Experience the songs like never before: From classical greats like violin or trombone to exotic instruments and even cats meowing or a choir there are thousands of possible combinations. (*) Please note: To create and upload your MIDI songs to Mod.io, you need access to a PC.
Title: Disaster Band

description: In Cyberpunk Samurai, you embody a warrior stripped of everything that once made you human—your flesh, your past, and even your voice. Thrust into a gritty, neon-lit world where biotech reigns supreme, this third-person swordplay adventure sets you on a relentless quest for retribution. Forge your path through the underbelly of a cyberpunk metropolis, where each shadowy corner and neon-lit alley holds the secrets to your past and the keys to your vengeance. Utilizing the visually stunning Unreal Engine, the game brings to life a breathtakingly immersive environment that is as perilous as it is picturesque. Key Features: Challenging Gameplay: Master the art of samurai combat with precision and skill, facing high-stakes challenges that will test even the most seasoned gamers. Immersive Worlds: Explore a variety of richly detailed environments crafted using the Unreal Engine, each teeming with secrets and hidden dangers. Formidable Adversaries: Encounter a roster of fearsome enemies, from cyber-enhanced thugs to advanced biotech creatures that challenge your every move. Epic Boss Battles: Confront towering big-bosses that will require all your wits, quick reflexes, and strategic thinking to defeat. Stylish Combat: Engage in fluid, dynamic combat with cool samurai animations that make every attack and counter a spectacle to behold. Unique Narrative: Unravel a compelling story of loss and revenge, where your journey is as much about reclaiming your identity as it is about settling old scores. Inspiration: Cyberpunk Samurai draws its inspiration from the timeless allure of samurai honor and the dystopian edge of cyberpunk aesthetics. Developed single-handedly by a dedicated indie developer, this game promises to deliver an unforgettable experience with every slice of the blade and every neon glow from the cyber-world. Embark on a quest not just for vengeance, but for identity in a world where the line between man and machine is blurred. Are you ready to redefine your destiny in the shadows of the cyberpunk city?
Title: Cyberpunk Samurai

description: Prepare for a colorful, fast-paced adventure! Perfect Ninja Painter is a colorful arcade puzzle game that's so much fun, it's hard to stop. Paint the walls through 50 levels and try to get all stars! The original Ninja Painter game has been played more than 100 million times on Flash, the web and mobiles since 2011, and now it's time to get this great experience in HD.
Title: Perfect Ninja Painter

description: Are you ready to test your courage and become a hero? Rescue Team throws you into the heart of the action as you join an elite group dedicated to saving lives in extraordinary circumstances. Brace yourself for adrenaline-pumping challenges, heart-stopping emergencies, and a constant race against the clock. Features: - Thrilling Emergencies: Navigate meticulously crafted environments, from bustling cityscapes to ravaged disaster zones. Each mission presents unique obstacles and dangers, demanding quick thinking and strategic decision-making to overcome them. - Diverse Specialist Team: Assemble a team of highly skilled professionals. Each member has specialized abilities and equipment, allowing you to tackle any situation. Deploy firefighters, paramedics, search and rescue experts, and more, working together as a cohesive unit to save lives. - Upgrade Your Arsenal: Earn resources from successful rescues and unlock new tools, upgrades, and equipment. From cutting-edge technology and advanced rescue vehicles to specialized gear and life-saving devices, your team will become a well-oiled machine, prepared for anything. - The Weight of Heroism: Your actions directly impact the fate of those caught in disaster. Rescue Team combines stunning visuals, immersive sound design, and intuitive gameplay to create an unforgettable experience. Feel the thrill of high-stakes rescues and the camaraderie of a dedicated team. - Answer the Call of Duty: Will you rise to the challenge? Become a true hero, saving lives and restoring hope when disaster strikes. The Rescue Team is counting on you. Will you rise to the challenge and become a true hero, saving lives and restoring hope in the face of adversity?
Title: Rescue Team 911 Simulator - Ambulance, Police, Firefighter

description: "Elemental Cube" takes you on a challenging and thought-provoking journey through a magical world. This single-player puzzle game consists of 50 unique levels, each requiring players to overcome obstacles with strategy, logic, and creativity. At the heart of the game is a mystical cube, with each face representing one of the four fundamental elements: fire, water, earth, and air. Players must rotate the cube right, left, up, and down to create the appropriate element combinations. Each element has its own unique properties that are vital for overcoming various obstacles encountered along the way. Fire can eliminate water barriers, while water can extinguish flames. Earth can be used to create pathways, and air combines with many elements to form special combinations. Each level in "Elemental Cube" is filled with carefully crafted puzzles. Players must plan their moves before taking the next step. As the levels progress, the difficulty increases, requiring more complex combinations and strategies. Players can achieve success by using the correct element at the right time and carefully calculating the cube's rotations. The game offers a captivating atmosphere and impressive visuals. Each element has its own distinct color palette and effects, adding depth to the game world. The glow of fire, the ripple of water, the solidity of earth, and the lightness of air provide a visually stunning experience. Music and sound effects draw players further into this magical world. Every movement, every element change, and every obstacle overcome is supported by its own unique sound. Dynamic and harmonious music complements the game's atmosphere, immersing players in the puzzles. "Elemental Cube" is a game that requires not only intelligence and logic but also patience and strategy. Completing each level gives players a great sense of satisfaction and achievement, while the overall pace and progression of the game provide a constant challenge. As players experience a new sense of accomplishment at the end of each level, they will be ready to face even more difficult and complex puzzles. If you love solving puzzles, enjoy brain games, and like developing strategies, "Elemental Cube" is perfect for you. Rotate your cube, manage the elements, and overcome obstacles to complete all the levels in this magical and challenging journey. Are you ready? Master the power of the elements and become the ultimate puzzle master!
Title: Elemental Cube
Publisher: Kanuni games oyun YAZILIM VE Pazarlama Ticaret limited Sirketi

description: Prepare to defy gravity, leap across vibrant landscapes, and flip through enchanting environments in the ultimate parkour jump simulator! Immerse yourself in the heart-pounding world of "Rainbow Ascend: Anime Girls Go Up," where you guide anime-style girls through a thrilling free-running adventure. Leap, vault, and sprint through diverse anime-inspired settings, each presenting its own unique obstacles and challenges. Your journey through this non-stop obstacle course isn’t just a game; it’s a captivating parkour odyssey. Main Features: - Enchanting Anime Environments: Dash and flip your way across beautifully crafted anime-style forests and houses, each packed with distinctive challenges that demand your parkour finesse. - Intuitive Controls: Master the easy-to-use swipe controls to unlock your full parkour potential and become a true urban ninja. - Thrilling Challenges: Conquer new obstacles, leap over gaps, and scale walls as you strategically navigate each level. Success isn’t just about speed; it’s about outsmarting the environment. - Social Competition: Share your awe-inspiring high scores, challenge your friends, and see who emerges as the ultimate anime runner. "Rainbow Ascend: Anime Girls Go Up" isn’t just about reaching your destination; it’s about the exhilarating journey you take to get there. Every run presents an opportunity to innovate and push the boundaries of parkour. Whether you’re a seasoned parkour pro or a newcomer to the world of free-running, "Rainbow Ascend: Anime Girls Go Up" guarantees a captivating and accessible experience that’s hard to put down. Lace up your sneakers, join the parkour craze, and always remember - in this game, the only way is UP!
Title: Rainbow Ascend: Anime Girls Go Up

description: Let's Journey - idle clicker rpg in amazing fantasy world. Choose your hero, roll dice and embark on an epic adventure! During the journey you will defeat hundreds of monsters, find rare equipment and meet legendary dragons. Luck and your skills will determine the fate of the dragon hunter! ★ FEATURES: • Press to deal extra damage • Level up the character to discover unique abilities • Upgrade active and passive abilities to increase strength • Use battle magic to change the course of the fight • Throw dice to determine your path • Visit various locations during the adventure • Defeat enemy to get gold and rare loot • Find the rare pets to increase your combat power • Fight or avoid the battle to achieve the main goal • Gather a collection of trophies defeating various monsters • Win mini games for best rewards • Complete quests during the adventure • Take the treasure map from the pirate captain • Upgrade rank to destroy stronger bosses • Clear the ruins of various monsters for a reward • Defeat epic bosses in the tournament • Learn all the skills of the hero in an fun endless fun journey • Receive permanent rewards to achieve the best results • Explore a new world in this incredible adventure RPG! ★ GAME MODES: • Roguelike Story Mode Play in Story to unlock new characters and receive a permanent dragon pet. Find out which dragon is each of the 12 hunters looking for and how will their meeting happen. • Roguelike lost treasure mode Explore an incredible fantasy world in the search of lost pieces of a treasure map. Complete the treasure map and fight with its guards to win a permanent gold reward which will help you fight more efficiently in every new game. • Raise your rank in roguelike survival mode Your rank will grow after each game. Survival will be harder and longer, but only by upgrading the rank you can achieve better results in other levels. Only the best player can become a legend! • Defeat monsters in ruins and bosses in the tournament The hunter will automatically increase the level, and coins will allow you to buy equipment in the nearest store. Learn and improve the necessary ability, buy items and pets. Fight an endless stream of monsters in ruins. Win the strongest bosses in the tournament. Get rewarded with permanent gold and become a legend! • Endless mode Learn all the skills of the heroes, collect all the unique trophies and equipment. Explore this incredibly fantasy world!
Title: Let's Journey

description: Kill Mosquitoes in the swamp. Hurry up before they disappear!
Title: Cazzarion: Mosquito Hunt

description: Zaggy Car is an endless journey through the desert where players collect money to unlock new cars. The more money they gather, the faster they go, making it increasingly challenging. Along the way, players can grab special items like double coins or a magnet for a limited time. The goal? Accumulate as much money as possible!
Title: Zaggy Car

description: Step into the shoes of a Border Patrol officer in “Border Police: Contraband Simulator 2024”, an immersive and meticulously crafted simulation game. This captivating experience throws you headfirst into the world of border security, where you'll face the daily challenges, responsibilities, and crucial decisions encountered by those who tirelessly safeguard borders. Key features: 1. Immersive Realism: Experience the meticulously crafted border with diverse terrains and realistic scenarios. 2. Authentic Equipment: Arm yourself with border patrol gear, from vehicles to surveillance gadgets. 3. Diverse Missions: Engage in a variety of missions reflecting border patrol responsibilities. 4. Intriguing Narrative: Navigate a narrative filled with intrigue, betrayal, and redemption as you make morally ambiguous choices. 5. Consequence-driven Gameplay: Your decisions shape the outcome of Max Riley's journey and the world around him. 6. Heart-pounding Action: Experience intense gunfights and nerve-wracking negotiations. Are you ready to uphold the law and protect the border?
Title: Border Police: Contraband Simulator 2024

description: Dive into a world where ancient evils clash in an epic struggle for supremacy. "Dracula VS Monsters" thrusts players into a dark and twisted realm where the legendary vampire lord faces off against a relentless onslaught of nightmarish creatures. Embark on a journey through hauntingly beautiful landscapes rendered in stunning pixel art, where every shadow conceals a new threat and every step could be your last. In this pulse-pounding action-adventure, survival is not just a goal—it's a desperate race against time. As players progress through the game's perilous levels, they must harness their wits and strength to overcome increasingly ferocious adversaries. But beware, for the deeper you delve into the darkness, the more powerful and cunning your enemies become. With its dynamic combat system and strategic gameplay mechanics, "Dracula VS Monsters" offers an immersive experience that will keep players on the edge of their seats. Will you emerge as the ultimate hunter of the night, or succumb to the insatiable hunger of the undead? The fate of the world hangs in the balance, and only the bravest souls dare to face the darkness head-on.
Title: Dracula VS Monsters

Title: Elemental Cube
Publisher: Kanuni games oyun YAZILIM VE Pazarlama Ticaret limited Sirketi

description: Dive deep into a vibrant underwater world in Aquatic Life: Fish Simulator RPG! Embark on an epic adventure as a small fish with a big destiny. Explore stunning coral reefs, vast oceans, and winding rivers as you evolve into a powerful and majestic creature. Features: - Evolve & Adapt: Transform from minnow to legend, unlocking powerful abilities. Choose your playstyle: predator or survivor. - Build Your Community: Rescue fish, forge alliances, and create a thriving underwater society. - Explore Diverse Biomes: Dive into stunning Coral Reefs, vast Oceans, and winding Rivers. Each with unique challenges and secrets. - Race for Glory: Test your speed and agility in thrilling underwater races! - Stunning Visuals: Immerse yourself in a captivating underwater world brought to life. - Endless Discovery: Uncover secrets, encounter fascinating creatures, and forge your own path.
Title: Aquatic Life: Fish Simulator RPG

description: Do you like Pac-Man? Can you handle this version of the game? Pac-man in 1 dimension, can you collect all the coins and escape from the ghost? Your goal is to collect as many coins as possible without getting caught by the ghost. The score will multiply each time you collect all the coins. You can eat a special coin that will allow you to eat the ghost and earn extra points.
Title: PAKU PAKU

description: Defend the city against attacking Bomber Aircrafts. Don't let any bombs reach the ground!
Title: Cazzarion: Bomber Attack

description: Find different cats and return them to their previous catgirls view. Try to create your own strategy for game. Explore this game! Lovely crush will help you to relax from reality. - 45 levels of relaxed puzzle match game - 5 amazing animated catgirls - 30 awesome art catgirls - relaxing music - 2D animation performance
Title: Lovely Crush

description: Runnero is an exhilarating endless runner game set in tunnels where players must navigate obstacles, collect points, and seize special items that grant temporary invincibility, double scores, or time slowdowns. As player accumulate points, the pace quickens, intensifying the challenge. Dodge obstacles, gather points, and push your reflexes to the limit in this adrenaline-fueled adventure!
Title: Runnero

description: This product entitles you to download both the digital PS4™ version and the digital PS5™ version of this game. Choose your game style: Quick match or tournament? Compete or play together in the stadium! Discover a multitude of games: whether you love football, basketball, weightlifting, trampoline, archery, or even bowling, you'll find all your favourite sports here! Defend your country and travel around the globe! Choose a country and compete to get new world records! As you progress in the game, you'll have the chance to unlock new costumes for your characters. Ready to showcase your skills and take on all the challenges? Then, get started and become the champion! If you already own the PS4™ version of this game, you can get the PS5™ digital version at no extra cost and you do not need to purchase this product. Owners of a PS4™ disc copy must insert it into the PS5™ every time they want to download or play the PS5™ digital version. PS4™ game disc owners who buy the PS5™ Digital Edition disc-free console will not be able to get the PS5™ version at no extra cost.
Title: 34 Sports Games - World Edition

description: Crush the cult of Astaroth and vanquish her hellspawn, make them squeal and hide where they came from. Enjoy a Fresh Look & Old Fun in this arcade horror FPS game inspired by the legends of the 90s. WELCOME TO HELL Dive into the depths of darkness in this heart-pounding, visceral experience designed for those who crave fast-paced and macabre gameplay. Drawing inspiration from the cult horror movies and chilling real-world locations, we meld gameplay mechanics from the genre's iconic titles of the 90s and 00s with our own twisted ideas, delivering a truly unique FPS experience. Brace yourself as you navigate through hellish realms, seamlessly transitioning between a distorted reality and an alternate infernal dimension with each harrowing act. Prepare to confront your deepest fears in this nightmarish odyssey. DEADLY ENEMIES TO CRUSH Prepare to wage a relentless battle against the forces of Hell as you confront an array of formidable adversaries in Bloodhound. Unleash your fury upon 16 distinctive enemies, each possessing their own twisted abilities and relentless determination to bring about chaos. From unholy abominations to diabolical cultists, every encounter will test your skill, reflexes, and strategic prowess. But that's not all – brace yourself for the ultimate challenges that await, as you come face-to-face with 5 devastating Hell bosses. These titans of torment will push you to the edge of your limits, demanding precise tactics and unwavering determination to overcome. HELLISH ARSENAL IN YOUR HANDS Unleash devastating firepower with an expansive arsenal at your disposal in Bloodhound. Arm yourself with a lethal assortment of weapons, each designed to deliver maximum carnage to your foes. From the swift and deadly machete to the bone-shattering shotgun and its formidable double-barreled counterpart, choose your weapon wisely to suit the situation at hand. IMMERSE YOURSELF IN A HELL OF A STORY Step into the shoes of a valiant member of the Order of Keepers of the Gates, entrusted with the sacred duty of safeguarding the portals to Hell. Standing in your path is the nefarious Cult of Astaroth, hell-bent on unleashing unspeakable evil upon the world. As the dark minions of Astaroth emerge, it falls upon you to eradicate the cultists and banish their wicked plans. Engage in intense battles, crush the forces of darkness, and restore balance before their malevolent Lord can return to sow chaos upon the earth.
Title: Bloodhound
Publisher: Kruger & Flint Productions Sp. z o. o.

description: This product entitles you to download both the digital PS4® version and the digital PS5® version of this game. This game is the third installment of "Story of Eroolia" series. The story begins after the ending of "How to Fool a Liar King." The half-cat half-human princess, Myana, who was previously a side character, is now our new heroine. ★STORY "Can the cat-eared princess' song rescue her people and find true love?" Princess Myana loves to sing, and believes she can make her people happy with her song. This time, she visits the human's country "Eroolia" as the leader of "Laarz", the country of cat people. Relations between humans and luccretias have never been good, and Princess Myana experiences it herself in Eroolia. Will her song be able to unite the hearts between humans and luccretias? Or as the imperial guard captain, Ludovic, argues, is it better to completely cut off ties between the two countries? ★FEATURES * Fantasy visual novel with Japanese voice acting. * Beautiful manga art. * Your choices influence the story. * Catchy vocal theme songs. * Romance between the strong-willed princess and the cold imperial guard captain who secretly likes...? ★STORY OF EROOLIA SERIES LIST 1. How to Take Off Your Mask Remastered 2. How to Fool a Liar King Remastered 3. How to Sing to Open Your Heart Remastered ★CAST Myana - Yuriko Yano Ludovic - Roku Aine Anna - Mai Hazuki Regina - Megurika Kawanishi Juli - Kon Leona - Ryo Yuasa Mars - Taichi Tanukida Black Cat - Zakuroishi Simon - Mitsuharu Ogura Lilia/ Lio/ Aria - Eruru Takeda Ronan - Mato Sarashina Grandma - Hisano Numahata Gao - Naoto Takeda If you already own the PS4® version of this game, you can get the PS5® digital version at no extra cost and you do not need to purchase this product. Owners of a PS4® disc copy must insert it into the PS5® every time they want to download or play the PS5® digital version. PS4® game disc owners who buy the PS5® Digital Edition disc-free console will not be able to get the PS5® version at no extra cost.
Title: How to Sing to Open Your Heart Remastered

description: Cliff Rockslide is a beloved news reporter from Butterfly Valley. And Butterfly Valley is one of those very unremarkable places where nothing happens. Except once you look a bit closer and you see that actually, those are the exact places where everything happens. Local News with Cliff Rockslide is a point-and-shoot interactive story about Cliff Rockslide, Butterfly Valley's epic news, zombies, cults, mysterious cubes, and everything and anything that can happen in a small town. The story is hand-crafted by one of Finland's top comedians and it can be described as country-side comedy. Your mission in the game is to shoot all the action to your camera as the freshly-hired cameraperson of Cliff. Follow the intense (and nonsense) action, point your cam, and shoot those shots. • First-person view of the story through your camera's lens • A perfect mix of point-and-click, visual novel, and FPS • Complete minigames, accomplish challenges and solve puzzles
Title: Local News with Cliff Rockslide

Title: Local News with Cliff Rockslide

description: Deluxe Edition includes: • SPY×ANYA: Operation Memories • Deluxe Outing Pack - Thrilling Costume Pack - Exciting Costume Pack - Anya's Bond Dress and Bond Hat • Deluxe Edition Bonus: Anya's Director Chimera Hat Based on the popular anime & manga series! Anya Forger has received a new assignment from school: create a photo diary of memories. On weekdays, head to class in the morning, then enjoy family time in the evening. On weekends, visit all sorts of exciting places, like the beach or art museums, in search of subjects worthy of photographing! What kind of photo diary will you help Anya create? • Take pictures when Anya finds something interesting! • There are many peculiar things that can catch Anya's attention, like butterflies, swings, and fun sights during outings! Take great photos to complete her diary. • There are a total of 10 outings to unique destinations for making memories! SPY×ANYA also features over 15 minigames! Enjoy over 15 minigames, including ones inspired by the anime series and those created originally for the game! Fight to stay in sync with Yor's special training, ride Bond as you play spy, and use Anya's telepathic powers to read opponents' cards in Tycoon. Bring out your inner fashionista with rich customization! Have fun dressing up Anya, Loid, Yor, and Bond in a wardrobe of over 80 unique outfits, accessories, and hairstyles! Purchase outfits from the in-game store with points earned from minigames. Play to your heart's content and unlock all kinds of clothes to wear on outings! Spend time with your favorite characters based on the manga series! In addition to Anya, Loid, Yor, and Bond; Damian and Becky from Eden College will also join the fun—not to mention Yor's brother, Yuri, and WISE agent Nightfall! Play at school together, get help with homework, and create countless precious memories with Anya's friends and family. *Custom outfits will not be displayed during certain minigames and cutscenes. *Some content included in the Deluxe Edition will be available for individual purchase. Please take care to not make duplicate purchases. *Bonus content may be distributed at a later date.
Title: SPY×ANYA: Operation Memories Deluxe Edition

description: Take on Sherlock Holmes and Dr. Watson's darkest cases, and put both your logic and your sanity to the test as you dig deeper for the mind-shattering truth. The Testament of Sherlock Holmes (PlayStation®4 only) In the heart of Victorian London, a shocking newspaper article accuses Sherlock Holmes of a heinous crime — the theft of a valuable gemstone collection. What are your options? Only one, you have to unravel the mystery that threatens to shatter your reputation. Despite the appearance that everything is spiraling out of control, you are Sherlock Holmes. So, go ahead and together with your sleuthing companion Dr. John Watson, clear your name and preserve your legacy. Sherlock Holmes The Awakened (Available on PlayStation®5 and PlayStation®4) A Lovecraft meets Sherlock Holmes crossover, The Awakened puts you up against the legendary Cthulhu Mythos. Investigate a series of mysterious disappearances, apparently linked to a dark cult that worships an Ancient God. Whatever their plan is, you must put a stop to it… or face unspeakable consequences.
Title: Sherlock Holmes: The Darkest Mysteries Bundle

description: This is the story of a journey through past dimensions, of a quest and an encounter.There is a new world connected to reality, a dimension that grows and expands every time something new is learned. It is on a plane which is parallel to our own and searchers call it the K-dimension.The beings that dwell in it feed on particles and threads of knowledge.There are guardians who are charged with conserving the integrity of the dimension by using the light of knowledge.But the kingdom of “IGNORANTIA” is trying to wipe out the K dimension.The constellation of infinity, where mathematics-related knowledge is stored, is now under threat.It is now down to the searchers to save it.
Title: K-ONE

description: Frogue is a stylish turn-based action platformer with bits of roguelite, bullet hell and time manipulation. Dash through your enemies, freeze time and throw your sword to solve every situation in YOUR way. - Dash to avoid bullet and kill your enemies! - Throw knifes to kill them at a distance. - Out of options? No problem, freeze time and make your own solution!
Title: FROGUE

description: EA SPORTS™ UFC® 5 is as real as it gets. Powered by Frostbite™ engine’s advanced rendering capabilities, your favorite fighters now have unparalleled character likenesses to complement next-level environment fidelity that’ll make their walk to the Octagon feel like a PPV main event. The all-new Real Impact System brings the intensity and strategy of a fight to life, as cuts and strikes absorbed can affect mobility, defense, stamina, and more. Take too much damage, and the doctor will check to see if you’re able to continue. For lovers of the ground game, Seamless Submissions makes grappling feel more fluid and realistic than ever before. And if you like to admire your handiwork, new Cinematic K.O. Replays capture your fight-ending finishes in all their punishing glory. UFC 5 updates with fresh new Fight Week content, features, and challenges every single month around real-world UFC events. Plus, Alter Egos offer new versions of your favorite fighters to play with every month. Bring the next evolution of the fight game home with UFC 5. Order* EA SPORTS™ UFC® 5 Ultimate Edition and receive: - Alter Egos: Origins (Israel Adesanya, Alexander Volkanovski, Valentina Shevchenko, Conor McGregor, Leon Edwards) - Origins Vanity Bundle (22 items) - Online Career Mode XP Boosts (x5) - Mike Tyson - Fedor Emelianenko - Muhammad Ali - UFC Legends (Kevin Randleman, Jens Pulver, Bas Rutten) - Alter Egos: Prime (Tony Ferguson, Nate Diaz, Donald Cerrone, Cody Garbrandt, Eddie Alvarez) - Alter Egos: PRIDE (Shogun Rua, Wanderlei Silva, Dan Henderson, Nick Diaz, Alistair Overeem) This game includes optional in-game purchases of virtual currency that can be used to acquire virtual in-game items.
Title: UFC® 5 Ultimate Edition

description: In a world still recovering from catastrophe, Mark Borja and his friends navigate the joys and woes of another year of high school. Wake up in a typical teenage bedroom, practice piano, race to meet homework deadlines, and build (and burn) relationships, as you reminisce about the daily insecurities of high school life. That is, until a fateful meeting sets off a chain reaction, upending Mark's life. People disappear and memories prove unreliable. Uncover a hidden truth with Mark and his friends in this narrative adventure and race to unravel the mystery before it's too late. Play Out Your Own Adventure Meet a diverse and achingly familiar cast of characters to converse with in person, over text, and through email. Get to know them, build relationships, flunk group projects, and watch how their individual personal stories unfold alongside yours. Investigate the Setting through Everyday Technology Explore the depths of social media where your likes and comments may pose consequences. Scroll through social posts, emails, webpages, and more on your in-game smartphone, where you might discover hints and clues about the people and world around you. Chat with your friends, classmates, and even strangers. Explore Themes of Love, Loss, and Friendship Tackle philosophical issues as the main character. Make mistakes and difficult choices. Will Mark stand up for his friends and be there when they need him or will he let them down? Can he heal his wounds by letting go of the past? Decide for yourself how Mark grows and strives to do better throughout the story. Play Addictively Mundane Minigames Insert a flash drive—oh wait, wrong way—nope, it was right the first time. Fight your friend for more fishballs at the food stand outside. Get in the groove to pay for the jeepney. Lose yourself in little games you find yourself playing in everyday life. Immerse Yourself in a Cinematic Visual Experience Witness an intriguing narrative uniquely presented in eye-catching hand-drawn pixel art and immerse yourself in the warm colors and music of a world trying to move on from tragedy. Characters, landscapes, and props blend in 3D. Shadows, reflections, and lighting set the tone in a lovingly crafted experience. Experience a World Inspired by Philippine Locations and Culture Traverse Philippine-inspired landscapes in search for the truth. From the heart of the bustling capital to long bus rides past grass fields and coast towns, explore the world of Until Then set in a fictional version of the Philippines. Interior spaces are shaped by the mannerisms of the locals, setting the scene for a recent past.
Title: Until Then

description: Enjoy playing the game where creativity meets education in a vibrant and interactive pixel art adventure! Unleash the artistic potential of your little ones with our user-friendly game designed to make learning fun. Dive into a world of colorful imagination with these key features: - Vibrant Color Palette: Explore a world of possibilities with a lively and child-friendly color palette. - Easy-to-Use Drawing Tools: includes a pencil and eraser, empower kids of all ages to effortlessly create masterpieces. - Stamps and Pre-made Art Assets: Enhance creativity from simple shapes to captivating characters, allowing kids to build on their artistic ideas. - Educational Elements: goes beyond fun, incorporating educational elements to teach basic color theory, spatial awareness, and coordination skills. - Kid-Friendly Themes: Spark enthusiasm with themes and templates aligning with popular children's interests, featuring adorable animals, beloved characters, and scenes from the wonders of nature. Embark on a colorful journey of artistic discovery with "Pixel Coloring Paint" – where creativity knows no bounds, and learning is an adventure!
Title: Pixel Coloring Paint

description: Vera Blanc: Full Moon: Vera Blanc is a mystery / detective game. Take on the role of Vera Blanc, a young and beautiful woman with an extraordinary power: the ability to read other people's minds! The game plays like a visual novel / adventure game with two endings for the mystery and a collection of challenging minigames. In this episode, our heroine travels to a mysterious town in Germany deep in the Black Forest. A serial killer is on the loose, and all leads point to a werewolf as the culprit! Features: * Visual novel with multiple endings * Solve a mystery * Variety of minigames * You can play with or without minigames * Comic book inspired art style Vera Blanc: Ghost In The Castle: Vera Blanc is a mystery / detective game. Take on the role of Vera Blanc, a young woman with the ability to read other people's minds. The game is a mixture of visual novel and adventure game with a collection of challenging minigames, you can also play as a pure visual novel. In this episode, our heroine travels to a small village in central Italy. The town's legendary ghost seems like nothing more than a quaint story, but a string of murders and suicides all point to the castle's ghost, and locals are getting scared. Will you be able to solve the mystery? Features * Visual novel with multiple endings * Solve a mystery * Variety of minigames (you can also play without them) * Comic book inspired art style
Title: Vera Blanc: Supernatural Mysteries

description: Embark on a high-octane, adrenaline-fueled adventure in Cyberpunk Parkour Uprising, a thrilling 3D game that merges the electrifying art of parkour with a dystopian cyberpunk world. Players are thrust into a sprawling urban landscape where freedom comes at a cost and agility is the ultimate weapon. Key Features: Dynamic Parkour Gameplay: Master the art of movement and freedom with seamless parkour mechanics. Run, jump, climb, and slide through futuristic cityscapes filled with obstacles and challenges. Choose Your Champion: Select from a diverse roster of characters, each with their own unique skills and abilities. Whether you prefer speed, agility, or strength, there's a character to suit every play style. Immersive Cyberpunk World: Explore a vividly realized cyberpunk universe, where neon-lit skyscrapers and dark alleyways create the backdrop for an uprising against oppressive forces. Customization and Progression: Unlock new characters, abilities, and customization options as you progress. Build your character to suit your preferred play style and dominate the cityscape. Synopsis: In a world where the city is a playground and the only way up is to defy gravity, Cyberpunk Parkour Uprising pits players against the forces of oppression in a fight for freedom. Are you ready to rise above and become the ultimate parkour champion?
Title: Cyberpunk Parkour Uprising

description: Destroy Ships in the sea with a Ship Hunter Airplane
Title: Cazzarion: Ship Hunting

description: In Guess The Object, players are presented with a mysterious silhouette of an object, challenging them to guess its identity from a selection of six options. With each correct guess, players earn points and additional time, keeping the excitement alive as they play endlessly. Can you decipher the shapes and emerge as the ultimate object identifier? Let the guessing begin!
Title: Guess The Object

description: Dive into an engaging jigsaw puzzle game where you assemble pieces under time pressure, revealing artwork inspired by manga and hentai. Can you maintain focus and reveal the entire image before time runs out? Game Features - Solve puzzles featuring mythical beauties in a manga- and hentai-inspired style. - Complete each puzzle within a set time limit to unveil captivating images. - Gain power-ups based on your performance to assist in efficient puzzle solving. - Use strategic thinking for faster piece placement and more effective play. - Challenge yourself to beat personal records and enhance your puzzle-solving skills. - Enjoy a wealth of puzzles with high replay value, continually testing your abilities. This streamlined, artistic puzzle game is ideal for those who relish a combination of classic puzzle mechanics, strategic elements, and enchanting visuals.
Title: Fantasy Beauties Premium Edition

description: This product entitles you to download both the digital PS4® version and the digital PS5® version of this game. Pogo Stick Champion is a 2D platformer game that pairs a relaxing aesthetic with challenging gameplay. Use a pogo stick to bounce your way through each level to reach through the end of the stage while avoiding hard falls and pits. As the difficulty increases you’ll encounter lasers, circular saws, spikes and other deadly obstacles, but don’t worry all levels unlocked, so you won’t get stuck! How far can you go with your pogo stick? Features: * 60 levels split into 4 worlds * All levels unlocked, you won’t get stuck on a level! * Pogo stick physics * Relaxing music If you already own the PS4® version of this game, you can get the PS5® digital version at no extra cost and you do not need to purchase this product. Owners of a PS4® disc copy must insert it into the PS5® every time they want to download or play the PS5® digital version. PS4® game disc owners who buy the PS5® Digital Edition disc-free console will not be able to get the PS5® version at no extra cost.
Title: Pogo Stick Champion

description: The Ouroboros King combines the strategic depth of chess with the build variety and replayability of roguelikes. Assemble a formidable army, discover powerful relics, and buy surprising gadgets to defeat the Coven. Core Gameplay • Build the Ultimate Army: Combine classic and new fairy chess pieces, relics that give them bonuses, and consumable items that grant you temporary advantages to create a formidable army. • Perfect Your Strategy: You can only move one piece per turn, so you must choose carefully. Make your troops work together to obliterate the enemy army. • Another Chance: If you're defeated you can go back to action on another timeline, where the path to victory will change: different map, different enemies, different rewards... in true roguelike spirit. Other Features • Lots of end-game options to dial up the difficulty to insane levels. • Same-device multiplayer, challenge your friends to chess games with lots of unique pieces. • Chess-based tactics, easy to learn and hard to master. • 15-45 minute runs, good for a short break and also longer sessions. • No gatekeeping, all the content is unlocked from the start. Win or die based on your skills. • No need to learn any chess openings or study anything.
Title: The Ouroboros King

description: The Ouroboros King combines the strategic depth of chess with the build variety and replayability of roguelikes. Assemble a formidable army, discover powerful relics, and buy surprising gadgets to defeat the Coven. Core Gameplay • Build the Ultimate Army: Combine classic and new fairy chess pieces, relics that give them bonuses, and consumable items that grant you temporary advantages to create a formidable army. • Perfect Your Strategy: You can only move one piece per turn, so you must choose carefully. Win or die based on your skills. • No need to learn any chess openings or study anything.
Title: The Ouroboros King

description: In The Inheritance of Crimson Manor you will experience a “Penny Dreadful” like gothic horror story set in a beautiful and enigmatic Victorian era manor with a dark secret. Unravel The Mystery After working for more than ten years as the private assistant of the enigmatic railroad magnate Hadley Strange, the news of his sudden and unexpected death along his entire family takes you by surprise. Now you have been appointed as the executor in charge of fulfilling his last will,and take care of his majestic manor, a luxurious property on the outskirts of London. Upon your arrival to the mansion you find an envelope with your name containing a letter bearing a cryptic set of instructions that might change your mind about who your former employer really was. Delve Into The Manor Explore a beautiful Victorian Mansion filled with fine art, secret passages and mysterious mechanical contraptions that will reveal to you even the most intimate aspects of the life, past and legacy of its former residents. Decipher curious locks and find key items and objects that will help you make your way through the 24 manor rooms in a non linear way, each room has a unique beauty and new pieces that will help you unveil the dark secret kept by the residence. Solve The Puzzles Solve clever riddles and fascinating mechanical puzzles crafted to ensure that only the right person could unveil the mansion's secret. Look for clues and take a closer look to your surroundings to discover the shocking truth about the mansion and it's mysterious residents. Find items and manage your inventory to make your way through the different passages of the mansion, examine many detailed items and discover how to use them to unlock all the rooms and get all the pieces to solve the manor puzzling secret, one so shocking that will leave you breathless.
Title: The Inheritance of Crimson Manor
Publisher: Tecnologías Móviles Especializadas S. de R.L.
